title: Use Essence Before End of Season
body:
Do we need to use our Orange essence too?
Will that be changing as well?

replies.body: Thanks SteveTheMiner!  While IP is being converted to Blue Essence, orange will not be impacted.
Orange Essence won't be changing for the next season. You can read more about the [**preseason here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ).
